attribute-definition.description: Enables Checkout.com Risk.js SDK integration for device fingerprinting.
If set to yes, the payment form will be enabled and the default credit card form disabled.
Configures the risk assessment performed during the processing of the payment
Should the payment method should run in sandbox or live mode.
If set to yes, the gateway requests and responses are displayed in the request log.
If set to yes, 3D Secure verification will be enabled for all transactions.
If set to yes, Non 3D Secure payment will be attempted if 3D Secure fails. Works only with 3D Secure enabled.
Set to true if you want the payment to be captured automatically after the authorisation. Set to false if you want to manually capture your payments.
Only if autocapture is set to true, Sets the time after which the capture is triggered automatically, in minutes.
Enable payments from customers in the Middle East.
Deprecated, used only for legacy transactions
Deprecated, used only for legacy transactions
Deprecated, used only for legacy transactions
NAS Sandbox private shared key provided by Checkout.com.
NAS Sandbox public key provided by Checkout.com.
NAS Sandbox secret key provided by Checkout.com.
Deprecated, used only for legacy transactions
Deprecated, used only for legacy transactions
Deprecated, used only for legacy transactions
NAS Live private shared key provided by Checkout.com.
NAS Live public key provided by Checkout.com.
NAS Live secret key provided by Checkout.com.
Should the Google Pay option run in test or production mode.
Enable payments with Google Pay using 3D Secure authentication.
Should the Apple Pay option run in test or production mode.
To store MADA Cards JSON Bin Config
Select the Region from the dropdown if the 'Region End Point' is needed for the service URL. The default selection is 'Others,' which will be ignored.
To set the service API endpoints according to the region Eg: https://ksa.api.sandbox.checkout.com. By default, the service uses the URL specified in the service credentials.

attribute-definition.display-name: Order Processed By ABC or NAS
